data.title: Anime Update: Brace Yourself For The Grand Finale of 'Demon Slayer Season 3' On This Day| Deets Inside
meta_keywords: demon slayer final season release date
data.meta_description: 'Demon Slayer Season 3' finale will be arriving on this day, as Crunchyroll reveals the premiere date for this thrilling-extended 70 minute episode.
data.text:
'Demon Slayer' fans must brace yourselves as the finale episode of season 3 is just around the corner. Crunchyroll finally announced the premiere date and details of the episode, where the extended 70-minute finale of the Swordsmith Village Arc will leave the viewers in awe.

Throughout the season, 'Demon Slayer' has managed to captivate their audience with its gripping adaptation of Koyoharu Gotoge's original manga series, 'Demon Slayer: Kimetsu No Yaiba.'

The finale episode will set the stage for the ultimate mega battle against the Upper Four Hantengu with the love of Hashira Mitsuri Kanroji joining the team. The climax promises the inclusion of Tanjiro, Nezuko, and Genya Chase after Hantengu's main body.

In the 11th episode, Mitsuri holds off Zohakuten whereas the trio still pursues awaiting a discovery where they slice open the tree ball where Hantengu was hiding. As Hantengu tries to escape once again, Genya's anger thus reaches a severe boiling point which then leads up to an intense confrontation with Nezuko thus getting into action where now the stage is set for the finale.

Crunchyroll announced that the finale episode of 'Demon Slayer Season 3' will be out on June 18, 2023, at 10:35 AM. The extended 70-minute episode will hit the conclusion brewing tension and excitement. Now, as the season comes to a finale, the Swordsmith Village Arc has also brought Mitsuri to new heights where the second Hashira is set to unlock a Demon Slayer mark after Tanjiro Kamado. It will also unleash a set of major events and surprises.

Also Read: Demon Slayer Season 3: Muichiroâ€™s Family Reunion Will Make Your Eyes Wet, But What's The Twist?

Season 3 has been a complete rollercoaster of emotions for the viewers where fights between foes were witnessed raising the stakes and also delivering intense battles with new character developments and jaw-dropping anime pieces.

Thus, make sure to gather your fellows and clear your schedule with the explosive finale on the move as it is approaching extremely fast. Get ready for an unforgettable journey and a thrilling conclusion.
